EmailTemplate.name: Gainsight NPS Survey Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Please participate in our NPS survey.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__DisplayName__c},
Your Opinion is Very Important to Us!
You are a valued COMPANY customer, so we would greatly appreciate your candid feedback on how we're doing. Our survey will take less than 5 minutes to complete, and your input will be instrumental in helping us improve COMPANY and your overall customer experience.
Take the Survey Now {!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__SurveyURL__c}?surveyId={!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__SurveyId__c}âˆ‚icipantId={!JBCXM__SurveyParticipant__c.JBCXM__Token__c}
Thank you very much for your time! Your COMPANY Customer Success Team <Add your company footer>
